sentences.sContent: ...a sensitive piece of equipment used to detect radiation.

remMethod.val: de(去掉) + tect(=cover遮盖) → 去除遮盖 → 查明

words.tran: 侦查，探测；发觉，发现；察觉

trans.tranCn: 洞察； 查明， 探测
trans.tranOther: To detect something means to find it or discover that it is present somewhere by using equipment or making an investigation
